title: Bug 132103No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
description: Steps to reproduce:1.New a data set and select it2.Swith to script view, choose "onFetch" and open paletteExpected result:Objects:this, row and reportContext should be given under ContextAnd other objects available for other methods(e.g. BeforeOpen) should be there as well.Actual result:Nothing under ContextThe relative bug is 126110
